name: Chess Bonk
description:
Chaotic chess arcade battle arena! 

In Chess Bonk, each player controls a lil chess master who can run around and pick up and put down pieces anywhere on the board. Each piece is given a "command" which controls its actions.

Game is still under development.
Currently we only have local multiplayer battle so you'll need 2 or more players. You can use controllers or  up to 3 people can share a single keyboard (WASD, Arrows, Numpad).

Controls - Controller
Left stick - Move
A - Pick up / put down
hold A to see placement spot
A - Select command
B - Open Command Wheel

Controls - Keyboard
WASD - Move
Space - Pick up / put down / select command
Left Shift - Open Command Wheel

Arrow Keys - Move
Right Shift - Pick up / put down / select command
Right Control - Open Command Wheel

Numpad 8456 - Move
Numpad Enter - Pick up / put down / select command
Numpad 0 - Open Command Wheel

Some Rules
Bonk the enemy King to win.
You can only pick up or command your pieces.
You can't pick up the King.
If a piece gets bonk'd you can pick them up and bring them back to your "bench" to heal.
If a piece is standing on your piece then you can't pick it up.
Pawns can attack in all four diagonals.

Commands
Advance - attack anything and scoot forward each turn
Overwatch - stay still and attack anything it can
Defend - if it is threatened, it will attack, otherwise it will try to move to safety
Hide - if threatened, try to move to safety
Nothing - won't do anything
